title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 505.3 - Form of notice of violation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 505.3 - Form of notice of violation

State Regulations
A notice of violation shall identify the respondent and be
on a form prepared by the commissioner and include, as applicable: (a) the name and address of the respondent
and the case or docket number assigned, if available; (b) the name and address of the registered
owner of the vehicle, if available; (c) the name and address and driver's license
number of the driver of the vehicle, if available; (d) name and title of the issuer of the
notice of violation; (e) date and
location of the issuance of notice of violation; (f) description of violation; (g) the amount of penalty or statement that a
penalty will be assessed at a hearing; and
(h) such additional matters as may be
pertinent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
505.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
